snippet: Nick Kyrgios looked completely disengaged at the Shanghai Masters, like he couldn't get off the court fast enough. Rafael Nadal fought as hard as he could to prolong his stay in China but came up short....
lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios looked completely disengaged at the Shanghai Masters, like he couldn't get off the court fast enough. Rafael Nadal fought as hard as he could to prolong his stay in China but came up short.

headline.print_headline: Nick Kyrgios Booed in Shanghai; Rafael Nadal Loses
headline.main: Nick Kyrgios Booed in Shanghai; Rafael Nadal Loses
